info.brief_description: Lilly Truscott from Hannah Montana ends up wearing diapers, but why is up to you.
info.description:
Lilly Truscott ends up wearing diapers, but why and how is up to you. Whether it be by an item or something else, and who does it is up to you to. This story is a spinoff of Tom Darcenn's short story in Pampered Tales of the Unknown. I have permission from him to write this story, please add chapters.
I would like to thank everyone who adds a chapter to my story, your additions are highly appreciated.

**Other characters can end up wearing diapers too, that way this story can continue on.**

**Note I don't own the copyrights to Hannah Montana, or its characters.**
info.pretty_title: Lilly Truscott Ends Up In Diapers
